A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first hour doesn't really fit with the saga that ensues.  It has moments towards the end...after a woke up.  The problem:  It's not Star Wars anymore.  It's all dream-filled time warps to make us question what is real and not real....what is time itself....bla bla bla.  I get it....it's cool....but the teleporting of souls is just too far out of the galaxy that I grew up with.
